localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit

blogPost.excerpt: The Stand & Spin Mat - this new, revolutionary mat allows you to smoothly pivot, swivel, and turn 360° while standing. Made of premium materials and podiatrist approved for active stretching and massaging. Never be bored again at your standing desk!
blogPost.body: The Stand & Spin Mat - this new, revolutionary mat allows you to smoothly pivot, swivel, and turn 360° while standing. Made of premium materials and podiatrist approved for active stretching and massaging. Never be bored again at your standing desk!
blogPost.title: Fidgity Stand & Spin Mat - Never be bored again at your standing desk
blogPost.author: stephen mark

localize.description: 站立与旋转垫--这款全新的、革命性的垫子可以让您在站立时平稳地旋转、旋转和360°旋转。由优质材料和足科医生认可的主动拉伸和按摩。再也不用无聊地站在办公桌前了!
localize.tagline: 站立式办公桌不再无聊

localize.description: 站立與旋轉墊--這款全新的、革命性的墊子可以讓您在站立時平穩地旋轉、旋轉和360°旋轉。由優質材料和足科醫生認可的主動拉伸和按摩。再也不用無聊地站在辦公桌前了!
localize.tagline: 站立式辦公桌不再無聊

previous.excerpt: Feather is an online platform that empowers creators and instructors to easily manage and monetize their virtual events, on-demand classes, and other digital content.
previous.title: Feather - Host Zoom events, sell masterclasses, and build your brand.

localize.description: Feather是一个在线平台，使创作者和讲师能够轻松地管理他们的虚拟活动、按需课程和其他数字内容，并使之货币化。
localize.tagline: 举办Zoom活动，销售大师班，建立您的品牌。

localize.description: Feather是一個在線平臺，使創作者和講師能夠輕鬆地管理他們的虛擬活動、按需課程和其他數字內容，並使之貨幣化。
localize.tagline: 舉辦Zoom活動，銷售大師班，建立您的品牌。

next.excerpt: Bored of long news articles? Nyus is a news app designed for teenagers. It gives news in the form of memes and makes news fun and engaging. We aggregate our news from the top news sources in India and are rated 4.6 stars on Play Store.
next.title: Nyus - Get news in the form of memes

localize.description: 厌倦了冗长的新闻文章？Nyus是一款专为青少年设计的新闻应用。它以备忘录的形式给出新闻，让新闻变得有趣和吸引人。我们从印度的顶级新闻来源汇总我们的新闻，并在Play Store上被评为4.6星。
localize.tagline: 以备忘录的形式获取新闻

localize.description: 厭倦了冗長的新聞文章？Nyus是一款專爲青少年設計的新聞應用。它以備忘錄的形式給出新聞，讓新聞變得有趣和吸引人。我們從印度的頂級新聞來源彙總我們的新聞，並在Play Store上被評爲4.6星。
localize.tagline: 以備忘錄的形式獲取新聞
